com.github.wuic.plugins.maven
Class StaticHelperMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.github.wuic.plugins.maven.StaticHelperMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
@Mojo(name="process",
      defaultPhase=GENERATE_RESOURCES,
      requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE)
public class StaticHelperMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

This MOJO helps to process nuts for static usage. "Static" means that nuts can't be processed at runtime so we have to invoke engine's chain of responsibility at build-time. This plugin supports only configuration from XML file.

Since:
0.4.1
Version:
1.1
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

write

public void write(Nut nut,
                  String wId,
                  PrintWriter workflowWriter)
           throws WuicException,
                  FileNotFoundException

Writes the given net into the output directory.

Parameters:
nut - the nut to be written
wId - the workflow ID
workflowWriter - the workflow print writer
Throws:
WuicException - if WUIC fails
FileNotFoundException - if output directory can't be reached
